author: GamingBolt
description:
We've dived back into Red Dead Redemption - yet again - as it makes its current-gen debut. But is this version of the game worthy of the effort it took to make it a reality, and is it worth your hard-earned time and money? 

We put in the hours, and while there are improvements that make this version of the game the one to beat, there are issues that underline its age. Could those issues have been avoided in an enhanced port? Probably not. 

What about a remake? That's a different story. Join us as we take a look at what works, and what doesn't, as we dive into an adventure that's high on nostalgia while also being a great take on the Wild West to boot.
title: Red Dead Redemption PS5 - PS5 Pro Review - Just The Bare Minimum

author: GamingBolt
description:
Microsoft Flight Simulator 2024, while technically ambitious with its weather systems, aircraft physics, and global photogrammetry, can be both intimidating for newcomers and liberating for veterans migrating over from PC. 

For the former, it means jumping into a cockpit that feels like an unsolvable puzzle; for the latter, it’s breaking old habits by re-learning workflows and interfaces. 

The good news for both is that once you get your bearings, the PS5 version is the same aviation sandbox PC players have enjoyed for decades.
title: Microsoft Flight Simulator 2024 PS5  - 15 Best Tips And Tricks To Know Before You Play

author: GamingBolt
description:
Single-player games have been a major part of 2025's line-up of brilliant titles that took the world by storm. But other titles came and went fairly quietly, leaving a mark only on the ones like us who got to enjoy them as part of what we love doing. However, that doesn't mean that you shouldn't get to enjoy them, not if we have anything to do with it. 

Join us as we take a look at some underrated adventures for you to try out, and perhaps make your holiday plans around. From horror games to platformers and roguelikes, there's something for everybody on this list. Your new favorite could be waiting for you to find and dive into, so let's get started.
title: 15 Sleeper Hits From 2025 You Never Got Around To Playing
